pageContext.claim: “The people of Puerto Rico.........are GREAT, but the politicians are incompetent or corrupt. Puerto Rico got far more money than Texas & Florida combined, yet their government can't do anything right, the place is a mess - nothing works.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is using selective math and suggesting without evidence that Puerto Rico officials are corruptly misusing disaster-relief funds. Texas has gotten more disaster relief funding from the federal government after Hurricane Harvey than Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria, though Puerto Rico may get more when factoring in 50 years of Stafford Act payments.
